GSD.product_version: versions from v5.16 to before v6.0.3
GSD.description:
drm/amdgpu: Fix memory leak in hpd_rx_irq_create_workqueue()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.3 by commit 600de40ed50c8b5ecb9c7a4f41eb882066c15a00, it was introduced in version v5.16 by commit 8e794421bc981586d0af4e959ec76d668c793a55. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: drm/amdgpu: Fix memory leak in hpd_rx_irq_create_workqueue()
